data.persona: I live with my family in the kingdom.  We follow the rules of the king, but we don't agree with all of them.  I despise him and wish to move away when we can.
data.description:
You are in the The old red barn.
This is an old run down red barn. It's two stories and most farmers wouldn't still be using it. It has chickens and cows inside and harvests eggs and milk for the entire family. The second story has a large pile of hay visible through an old opening in the front.
There's a large pile of hay, a hay, an eggs, a milk, and a cow here.
The farmer is here.

You are carrying nothing, and wearing a clothes.
data.goal: steal large pile of hay from farmer

data.short_motivation: I need to make a bed for the cow and the farmer keeps taking my hay
data.mid_motivation: I must help the cow deliver her offspring
data.long_motivation: I need more cows because our business is planning on expanding & we need money to fund our ventures
